      • checkXULRunner

        public static boolean checkXULRunner(java.io.File f,
                     java.lang.String version,
                     java.lang.String source)

      • findXULRunner

        public static java.io.File findXULRunner()
        Look for the xulrunner, if the MozillaConfig.getXULRunnerHome is set then that will be used first. On OSX this will be called in the gui thread which should not be blocked. So for example you should not call JOptionPane methods which block.
        Returns:

      • findXULRunner

        public static java.io.File findXULRunner(XULRunnerFinder.FindMethod[] findMethods,
                         java.lang.String version)

      • isXULRunnerDir

        public static boolean isXULRunnerDir(java.io.File f1)

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion(java.io.File xulrunnerHome)
        Currently this uses a version.properties file located in the xulrunner home directory. That file will probably only be there if this xulrunner has been installed by mozswing. This method could be expanded to execute the xulrunner binary in the folder and have it print out the version.
        Parameters:
        xulrunnerHome -
        Returns:

      • checkVersion

        public static boolean checkVersion(java.io.File xulrunnerHome,
                   java.lang.String version)
        If version is null this will return true. This method is intended to be used as the different findMethods look for a valid xulrunner. If they don't care about the version they will just pass in null.
        Parameters:
        xulrunnerHome -
        version -
        Returns:
